work.name: KU Leuven
work.summary: Reseracher on distributed machine learning and signal processing methods for wireless sensor networks within the Biomed-STADIUS group, focusing in biomedical applications.
highlights: Built novel distributed ML and SP algorithms (for denoising, dimensionality reduction, correlation & component analysis, etc.) in adaptive settings for EEG sensors, microphone arrays, etc.
Created a generic framework for these methods including rigorous analyses and theoretical guarantees
Developed a toolbox implementing this framework in Python and MATLAB, fully available on Github
Extending the algorithmic framework that I built toward new fields, such as federated learning
